dependencies.name: py-ipywidgets
dependencies.description: IPython widgets for the Jupyter Notebook

dependencies.name: py-jupyterlab
dependencies.description:
JupyterLab is the next-generation web-based user interface for Project
Jupyter.

dependencies.name: py-keyring
dependencies.description:
The Python keyring library provides an easy way to access the system
keyring service from python. It can be used in any application that
needs safe password storage.

dependencies.name: py-lerc
dependencies.description: Limited Error Raster Compression.

dependencies.name: py-matplotlib
dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pyshp
dependencies.description:
The Python Shapefile Library (pyshp) reads and writes ESRI Shapefiles in
pure Python.

dependencies.name: py-python-certifi-win32
dependencies.description:
This package patches certifi at runtime to also include certificates
from the windows certificate store.

dependencies.name: py-requests
dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.

dependencies.name: py-requests-ntlm
dependencies.description:
This package allows for HTTP NTLM authentication using the requests
library.

dependencies.name: py-requests-oauthlib
dependencies.description: This project provides first-class OAuth library support for Requests.

dependencies.name: py-requests-toolbelt
dependencies.description:
A toolbelt of useful classes and functions to be used with python-
requests

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-six
dependencies.description: Python 2 and 3 compatibility utilities.

dependencies.name: py-ujson
dependencies.description: Ultra fast JSON decoder and encoder written in C with Python bindings.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.description: IPython HTML widgets for Jupyter

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
